Source.Name: yelp
Source.Description: Yelp is the default help browser for the GNOME desktop. Yelp provides a simple graphical interface for viewing DocBook, HTML, man, and info formatted documentation. The name Yelp was suggested by Daniel Lundin. Yelp is pronounced the same as the swedish word for 'help'.
